Articles.Content:
When I'm done with a mission or flight, I keep wanting to click on the breadcrumb at the top to go back to Kerbin or the KSC. When away from the KSC the KSC option disappears. However, when I click on Kerbin in the breadcrumb, a menu could pop down that offers suggestions of the various buildings on Kerbin. Doing this for other bodies could offer the suggesting of the Tracking Station and when entering it that body is pre-selected for me.

 

For reference:

Yes,and I think there should be hotkeys for the buildings.

It's very hard to go through the escape menu all the time.
